about_the_game:
The epic Soundtrack of Two Worlds II - Shattered Embrace with over 70 minutes full of atmospherically toned music will be a feast for your ears.  

Playlist



  • 01. Shattered Embrace - Main Theme -- [03:00]
  • 02. Shadinar Walls -- [02:12]
  • 03. Ruins of Gromshar -- [02:10]
  • 04. Mountain Dream -- [03:02]
  • 05. Royal Gardens -- [02:05]

  • 07. Crazy Ivan's Tavern -- [03:02]
  • 08. Soul of Hope (King's Theme) -- [02:49]
  • 09. Children of Arveran -- [03:12]
  • 10. Tragedy of Beauty (Dark Side) -- [02:14]
  • 11. Redemption Within (Bright Side) -- [02:56]
  • 12. Alone on the Journey -- [03:10]
  • 13. Dreamflower -- [02:53]
  • 14. Devil's Recital -- [02:10]
  • 15. Come to us -- [02:07]
  • 16. We are Baal -- [02:22]
  • 17. Salvation -- [01:49]
  • 18. Purple Horizon -- [02:34]
  • 19. New Voices of Ancient World -- [02:48]
  • 20. One More Time -- [02:46]
  • 21. Here We Go Again -- [02:27]
  • 22. Freehaven Night Theme -- [02:12]
  • 23. Waves Battle -- [02:35]
  • 24. Hanging Around -- [02:15]
  • 25. Shores of Freehaven -- [02:22]
  • 26. Danger from above -- [00:55]
  • 27. Canyon Chase -- [01:42]
  • 28. Waterfall -- [01:29]
  • 29. Athria Beach -- [02:06]
  • 30. Path of the Hero -- [01:55]
  • 31. Future Never Lies -- [02:12]
  • 32. Dark Cult -- [02:06]
  • 33. Main Theme REMIX -- [02:59]
